org.apache.struts2.jasper

Interface Options

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmbeddedServletOptions, JspC

    public interface Options
    A class to hold all init parameters specific to the JSP engine.
    Author:
    Anil K. Vijendran, Hans Bergsten, Pierre Delisle

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorOnUseBeanInvalidClassAttribute

        boolean getErrorOnUseBeanInvalidClassAttribute()
        Returns:
        true if Jasper issues a compilation error instead of a runtime Instantiation error if the class attribute specified in useBean action is invalid.

      • getKeepGenerated

        boolean getKeepGenerated()
        Returns:
        Are we keeping generated code around?

      • isPoolingEnabled

        boolean isPoolingEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if tag handler pooling is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getMappedFile

        boolean getMappedFile()
        Returns:
        Are we supporting HTML mapped servlets?

      • getClassDebugInfo

        boolean getClassDebugInfo()
        Returns:
        Should we include debug information in compiled class?

      • getCheckInterval

        int getCheckInterval()
        Returns:
        Background compile thread check interval in seconds

      • getDevelopment

        boolean getDevelopment()
        Returns:
        Is Jasper being used in development mode?

      • getDisplaySourceFragment

        boolean getDisplaySourceFragment()
        Returns:
        Should we include a source fragment in exception messages, which could be displayed to the developer ?

      • isSmapSuppressed

        boolean isSmapSuppressed()
        Returns:
        Is the generation of SMAP info for JSR45 debugging suppressed?

      • isSmapDumped

        boolean isSmapDumped()
        Returns:
        Indicates whether SMAP info for JSR45 debugging should be dumped to a file. Ignored is suppressSmap() is true

      • getTrimSpaces

        boolean getTrimSpaces()
        Returns:
        Should white spaces between directives or actions be trimmed?

      • getIeClassId

        String getIeClassId()
        Returns:
        Class ID for use in the plugin tag when the browser is IE.

      • getScratchDir

        File getScratchDir()
        Returns:
        What is my scratch dir?

      • getClassPath

        String getClassPath()
        Returns:
        What classpath should I use while compiling the servlets generated from JSP files?

      • getCompiler

        String getCompiler()
        Returns:
        Compiler to use.

      • getCompilerTargetVM

        String getCompilerTargetVM()
        Returns:
        The compiler target VM, e.g. 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, or 1.5.

      • getCompilerSourceVM

        String getCompilerSourceVM()
        Returns:
        Compiler source VM, e.g. 1.3, 1.4, or 1.5.

      • getCompilerClassName

        String getCompilerClassName()
        Returns:
        Java compiler class to use.

      • getTldLocationsCache

        TldLocationsCache getTldLocationsCache()
        The cache for the location of the TLD's for the various tag libraries 'exposed' by the web application. A tag library is 'exposed' either explicitely in web.xml or implicitely via the uri tag in the TLD of a taglib deployed in a jar file (WEB-INF/lib).
        Returns:
        the instance of the TldLocationsCache for the web-application.

      • getJavaEncoding

        String getJavaEncoding()
        Returns:
        Java platform encoding to generate the JSP page servlet.

      • getFork

        boolean getFork()
        Returns:
        boolean flag to tell Ant whether to fork JSP page compilations.

      • getJspConfig

        JspConfig getJspConfig()
        Returns:
        Obtain JSP configuration information specified in web.xml.

      • isXpoweredBy

        boolean isXpoweredBy()
        Returns:
        Is generation of X-Powered-By response header enabled/disabled?

      • getTagPluginManager

        TagPluginManager getTagPluginManager()
        Returns:
        Obtain a Tag Plugin Manager

      • genStringAsCharArray

        boolean genStringAsCharArray()
        Returns:
        Are Text strings to be generated as char arrays?

      • getModificationTestInterval

        int getModificationTestInterval()
        Returns:
        Modification test interval.

      • isCaching

        boolean isCaching()
        Returns:
        Is caching enabled (used for precompilation).

      • getCache

        Map getCache()
        The web-application wide cache for the returned TreeNode by parseXMLDocument in TagLibraryInfoImpl.parseTLD, if isCaching returns true.
        Returns:
        the Map(String uri, TreeNode tld) instance.
